meanings.definition: A mythical substance believed to grant immortality.
meanings.sent1: Legends speak of a magical amrita that bestows eternal life.
meanings.sent2: In ancient tales, heroes search for the elusive amrita to live forever.
meanings.sent3: The wizard's potion was said to contain the precious amrita of everlasting youth.
meanings.sent4: The fountain of amrita bubbled with the promise of endless days.
meanings.sent5: The golden amrita shimmered with the power of eternal renewal.

meanings.definition: A sweet liquid believed to flow from the pineal gland during deep meditation.
meanings.sent1: During meditation, some believe they can taste the ethereal amrita on their tongues.
meanings.sent2: Yogis seek to awaken the flow of amrita for spiritual enlightenment.
meanings.sent3: The guru joked that drinking amrita would make one a meditation master overnight.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a wellspring of creativity, an amrita flowing from within.
meanings.sent5: The sweet scent of amrita filled the air, calming the restless mind.

meanings.definition: A name for a type of plant in the genus Amrita.
meanings.sent1: The rare amrita plant blooms only once a year, filling the garden with beauty.
meanings.sent2: Botanists study the unique properties of the amrita plant for medicinal purposes.
meanings.sent3: The herbalist's amrita leaves were rumored to cure any ailment.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, the amrita plant stood out like a beacon of natural wonder.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the amrita flower held the essence of healing.
